title: Blue Archive "Millennium Quest"
description: An epic RPG created a long time ago by the Millennium Science School's Game Development Department - Millennium Quest.

command-selection.back: Go back to the previous menu.

equipment.name: Equipment

notice.title: Notice
notice.notice-1: It may take some time for the game to start up. Please wait, even if the screen turns dark for a little bit.
notice.notice-2: The game does not have any save data. Progress is not saved across reloads.
